description: Share of the population that claims to always or often adopt environmentally friendly behaviour - In percent
remark: 2019: break in the time series due to a methodological change A confidence interval informs about the precision of results of sample surveys. The interval contains the true value with a probability of 95%. Last update:  01.02.2024 Source: FSO – Omnibus surveys 2011, 2015, 2019 & 2023 © FSO 2024
